Package game

Class HeliDropper

java.lang.Object
game.HeliDropper
public class HeliDropper
extends java.lang.Object
Drops the falling characters from a helicopter outside of the field of view, hence the name HeliDropper. It drops either haters and supporters or only haters.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HeliDropper​(GameLevel gameLevel, boolean includeSupporters)
    The constructor for the HeliDropper class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void dropCharacter()
    Drops each character one at a time, removing each character information object from the stack and creating Generic Characters from those information objects.
    void dropSpecificCharacter​(java.lang.String name, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position, float gravityScale)
    Drops a specific character into the level.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • HeliDropper

      public HeliDropper​(GameLevel gameLevel, boolean includeSupporters)
      The constructor for the HeliDropper class.
      Parameters:
      gameLevel - the level HeliDropper is being used in
      includeSupporters - a boolean condition check which determines whether or not this specific HeliDropper will drop supporters as well as haters.

  • Method Details

    • dropCharacter

      public void dropCharacter()
      Drops each character one at a time, removing each character information object from the stack and creating Generic Characters from those information objects. If the stack is empty, it will be reinitialized before further dropping.

    • dropSpecificCharacter

      public void dropSpecificCharacter​(java.lang.String name, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position, float gravityScale)
      Drops a specific character into the level. Note that the character must be a falling character generated by the HeliDropper class.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the character
      position - the position of the character
      gravityScale - the force of gravity that is applied to the character
